title: Save up to £225 on this bike maintenance course!
content:

The course is taught by cross country racer, bike maintenance expert and YouTuber Daniel Dziemieszonek, and while it usually costs £249, you can get full access for just £23.99, with this exclusive deal! All you need to do is enter the code IOABIKE at the checkout and enrol today!

Get £225 off

The International Open Academy is an e-learning platform that helps people of all ages and backgrounds develop their skills. Courses are led by industry experts, with text-based material as well as interactive video classes, so you’ll receive all the support you need.

Once you successfully complete each module in the Complete Guide to Bike Maintenance course, you’ll earn a certificate to recognise your achievement. The key content is as follows:

  • The most common bike maintenance mistakes and how to avoid them
  • How to adjust your bike’s brakes, suspension and derailleurs
  • Which bike tools you should invest in and why
  • How to service each area of your bike
  • How to build a bike at home
